listitem.para: Main developer. He started the work on this project when he took part in the Google Summer of Code 2007 program as a student.
Mentored this project during its development as part of the Google Summer of Code 2007 program.

Participant of the Google Summer of Code 2008 program. Mentored by The NetBSD Foundation, he worked on the atfify NetBSD-SoC project and, as a side-effect, he contributed to the ATF source code. He developed the initial version of the atf-check utility and started the addition of the ATF_REQUIRE family of macros in the C interface.
